text: Ghost in the Noonday Sun is a 1974 British comedy movie directed by Peter Medak and based on the novel by Sid Fleischman. It stars Peter Sellers, Spike Milligan, Anthony Franciosa, Clive Revill, Peter Boyle, Rosemary Leach, James Villers and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Peter Medak Category:Columbia Pictures movies
